item.name: 分页列表 - 获得我创建的和我参加的所有项目

request.description: 获得我创建的和我参加的所有项目，可按projectName模糊搜索

item.name: 获得我的项目和我参加项目的列表
获得一个项目的详情（不包含成员）
给某一个项目添加一个或多个成员
从项目中移除一个或多个成员
获取某个项目的成员列表
模糊查询，用户是否在某个项目中

request.description: 上传app，保存app文件，返回app的基本信息，如name，sdkversion，ID，type等
该app所属project，和该app实际的版本号

如果传projectId，则返回该项目（必须是该用户可见的项目）下所有的应用；
如果不传projectId，则返回该用户可见项目的所有应用。
appName 支持模糊查询

查询条件和分页一样
如果传projectId，则返回该项目（必须是该用户可见的项目）下所有的应用；
如果不传projectId，则返回该用户可见项目的所有应用。
appName 支持模糊查询

header.name: cache-control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: content-type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: expires
header.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

header.name: pragma
header.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

header.name: transfer-encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: x-content-type-options
header.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

header.name: x-frame-options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

header.name: x-xss-protection
header.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) filter

body.raw:
{
	"content":"#coding:UTF-8
import os,sys
from time import sleep
# import unittest
sys.path.append(r'C:\Python27\Lib\site-packages')
from appium import webdriver
PATH = lambda p: os.path.abspath(
    os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), p)
)

desired_caps = {}
desired_caps['platformName'] = 'Android'
# desired_caps['platformVersion'] = '4.2.2'
desired_caps['deviceName'] = 'Android Emulator1'
# desired_caps['udid'] = '192.168.187.101:5555'
# desired_caps['udid'] = 'b15d91f'
desired_caps['app'] = PATH('C:/Users/yxin/Desktop/Projs/Testwa/ContactManager.apk')
desired_caps['appPackage'] = 'com.example.android.contactmanager'
desired_caps['appActivity'] = '.ContactManager'
# desired_caps['appPackage'] = 'com.tuniu.app.ui'
# desired_caps['appActivity'] = 'com.tuniu.app.ui.homepage.LaunchActivity'
# desired_caps['noReset'] = True
# desired_caps['newCommandTimeout'] = 1000
desired_caps['testSuit'] = 1
desired_caps['testcaseId'] = 2
# desired_caps['dontStopAppOnReset'] = True

wd = webdriver.Remote('http://localhost:4723/wd/hub', desired_caps)
# wd.get_screenshot_as_file(r'C:\Users\yxin\Desktop\sc.png')
# wd.implicitly_wait(60)

#record device width*height
# originScreenWidth = 1080
# originScreenHeight = 1920
# windows_size = wd.get_window_size()
# currentWidth = windows_size.get('width')
# currentHeight = windows_size.get('height')
# screenRatioX = currentWidth/originScreenWidth
# screenRatioY = currentHeight/originScreenHeight
# el = wd.find_element_by_name("Add Contact")
# el = wd.find_element_by_accessibility_id("Add Contact======================")
el = wd.check_element_by_accessibility_id("Add Contact======================", "test")
# el = wd.find_element_by_android_uiautomator('new UiSelector().text("Add Contact")')
# el = wd.find_element_by_xpath('//android.widget.Button[@text="Add Contact"]')
# el.click()
# pngData = wd.get_screenshot_as_png()

# print(pngData)
# wd.get_screenshot_as_file("C:/Users/yxin/Desktop/Projs/screenshot/testScreenshot.png")
# textfields = wd.find_elements_by_class_name("android.widget.EditText")
# textfields = wd.check_elements_by_class_name("android.widget.EditText")
# textfields[0].send_keys('edwaard')
# textfields[1].send_keys('123d456')
# textfields[2].send_keys('lht82a1008@163.com')

# wd.find_element_by_xpath("/hierarchy/android.widget.FrameLayout[1]/android.widget.LinearLayout[1]/android.widget.FrameLayout[1]/android.widget.RelativeLayout[1]/android.widget.RelativeLayout[2]/android.widget.TextView[1]")
# sleep(2)
# wd.swipe(571*screenRatioX,1672*screenRatioY,571*screenRatioX,482*screenRatioY,800)
# wd.tap([(966*screenRatioX,1833*screenRatioY)],500)
# sleep(5)

wd.quit()
"
}

request.description:
如果传projectId，则返回该项目（必须是该用户可见的项目）下所有的应用；
如果不传projectId，则返回该用户可见项目的所有应用。
appName 支持模糊查询

查询条件和分页一样
如果传projectId，则返回该项目（必须是该用户可见的项目）下所有的应用；
如果不传projectId，则返回该用户可见项目的所有应用。

header.name: cache-control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: content-type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: expires
header.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

header.name: pragma
header.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

header.name: transfer-encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: x-content-type-options
header.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

header.name: x-frame-options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

header.name: x-xss-protection
header.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) filter

item.name: 根据项目ID获取当前用户角色
